thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Rick K.
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Rick K.

author: Rick K.
title: Rick K.
text: James, Pelican Customer Service helped us to replace the Pelican Salt-Free softener with their salt water softener at a discount that we're were happy with and expedited the shipping. We are happier with their salt water softener because we no longer have calcium deposits on our dishes and counter tops. We must have very hard water. And their salt water softener doesn't leave a slimy feeling after a shower. James was very understanding, helpful and patient with us. We appreciate it!
